div.div: Mount St. Joseph vs. DePauw University

tr.td: DePauw wins toss and will receive defending South goal
Porter kickoff 62 yards to the DPU03, Jason Kirchhoff return 29 yards to the DPU32 (James).
Jason Kirchhoff rush for 14 yards to the DPU46 (Mike Williams).
